title: Radisson Hotel Group signs strategic partnership with NILE Hospitality for growing Park Inn & Suites by Radisson brand
description: Radisson Hotel Group partners with NILE Hospitality for strategic expansion of Park Inn & Suites by Radisson in Rajasthan and Gujarat. Nikhil Sharma and Vikram Singh Chauhan express enthusiasm for the partnership, aiming to cater to the growing demand for quality hospitality experiences in tier two to tier five cities in India.
